ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation

Session Log File Max Time Period

Post SQL
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: update osewf_etl_workflow set workflow_status='SKIPPED' where osewf_etl_workflow.workflow_name='$PMWorkflowName' and osewf_etl_workflow.workflow_status in ('STARTED','POLLING')

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Fail task if any command fails
Fail task if any command fails

WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: Workflow to extract Physical Positions from ODS and create output file for DWH
WORKFLOW.NAME: wf_EXTRACT_INV_GLOBAL_GOPS

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
-- -- OSINV_Infa_Extract.sql -- -- Ver Date Author Comment -- 1.0 12/08/2011 JP Initial commit to Clearcase -- 1.1 12/09/2011 JP Amend Trans Vers, Air Vac Indicator -- rev01 --1.2 15/09/2011 JP Add Front Back Indicator --1.3 22/11/2011 JP Filter on POSTING_TYPE, S Only SELECT ODS_PP_POSITIONS.OSEDS_END_OF_DAY_ID, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.OSEDS_SYSTEM_ID, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.OSEDS_RUN_NUMBER, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.OSEDS_END_OF_DAY_TYPE, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.OSEDS_END_OF_DAY_STATUS_NAME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.OSEDS_START_DATE_TIME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.OSEDS_END_DATE_TIME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.OSEDS_RELEASE_DATE_TIME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.OSEDS_WD1_REGION_NAME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.OSPSP_PK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.VALUATION_OSVAL_FK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.AS_AT_DATETIME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.VALUATION_ID_FRONT_BACK VALUATION_ID, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.VALUATION_VERSION_NUMBER, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.TRANSACTION_OSTRA_FK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.TRANSACTION_ID, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.TRANSACTION_REFERENCE, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.TRANSACTION_VERSION, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.SHIPMENT_VERSION_NUMBER, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.PARCEL_VERSION_NUMBER, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.TRANSACTION_TYPE, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.BUSINESS_DAY_OSBSD_FK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.BUSINESS_DAY, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.PREVIOUS_BUSINESS_DAY, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.IST_BUSINESS_UNIT_RDIBU_FK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.IST_BUSINESS_UNIT_NAME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.LEGAL_ENTITY_NAME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.RDLGE_GI, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.RDIBU_GI, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.REGION_RDREG_FK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.REGION_NAME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.RDREG_GI, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.CHAIN_OSCHA_FK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.CHAIN, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.CHAIN_PREFIX, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.CHAIN_NUMBER, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.BOOK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.BENCH, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.INVENTORY_GRADE_RDGRD_FK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.INVENTORY_GRADE_NAME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.INVENTORY_RDGRD_GI, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.MARKET_RDLOC_FK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.MARKET_NAME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.PARENT_MARKET_NAME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.MARKET_RDLOC_GI, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.INTANK_FACILITY_RDFAC_FK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.INTANK_FACILITY_NAME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.INTANK_FACILITY_DESCRIPTION, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.INTANK_RDFAC_GI, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.POSITION_DATE, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.COL_GAS_CYCLE_RDEPE_FK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.COL_GAS_CAL_NAME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.COL_GAS_PERIOD_NAME, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.COL_GAS_PERIOD_CODE, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.RDEPE_PK, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.INVENTORY_TYPE_IND, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.POSTING_TYPE_IND, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.AIR_VAC_INDICATOR, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.QUANTITY_BBL, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.QUANTITY_MT, ODS_PP_POSITIONS.QUANTITY_M3 FROM
(select oseds.end_of_day_id OSEDS_END_OF_DAY_ID, oseds.system_id OSEDS_SYSTEM_ID, oseds.run_number OSEDS_RUN_NUMBER, eodtype.name OSEDS_END_OF_DAY_TYPE, eodstat.name OSEDS_END_OF_DAY_STATUS_NAME, oseds.start_date_time OSEDS_START_DATE_TIME, oseds.end_date_time OSEDS_END_DATE_TIME, oseds.release_date_time OSEDS_RELEASE_DATE_TIME, coalesce(oseds_reg.name,'NA') OSEDS_WD1_REGION_NAME, ospsp.ospsp_pk, -- Valuations data ospsp.valuation_osval_fk, ospsp.AS_AT_DATETIME, osval.VALUATION_ID, osval.VALUATION_VERSION_NUMBER, ospsp.transaction_ostra_fk , concat(ostra.transaction_reference , '-' , CASE WHEN tratyp.name='DEAL PARCEL' THEN coalesce(ostra.SHIPMENT_VERSION_NUMBER,0)+coalesce(ostra.PARCEL_VERSION_NUMBER,0)+coalesce(ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER,0) WHEN tratyp.name='BALANCING PARCEL' THEN coalesce(ostra.SHIPMENT_VERSION_NUMBER,0)+coalesce(ostra.PARCEL_VERSION_NUMBER,0)+coalesce(ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER,0) WHEN tratyp.name='STOCK PARCEL' THEN ostra.SHIPMENT_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='OTC SWAP' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='OTC OPTION' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='FUTURE' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='CLEARED SWAP' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='CLEARED OPTION' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='EXCHANGE OPTION' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='PARTIAL' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='INVENTORY POSITION' THEN 1 WHEN tratyp.name='IN TRANSIT' THEN 1 WHEN tratyp.name='FUTURES POSITION' THEN 1 WHEN tratyp.name='COST' THEN ostra.OSTRA_PK WHEN tratyp.name=concat('P',chr(38), 'L ADJUSTMENT' )THEN ostra.OSTRA_PK END) TRANSACTION_ID, osval.TRANSACTION_REFERENCE, CASE WHEN tratyp.name='DEAL PARCEL' THEN coalesce(ostra.SHIPMENT_VERSION_NUMBER,0)+coalesce(ostra.PARCEL_VERSION_NUMBER,0)+coalesce(ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER,0) WHEN tratyp.name='BALANCING PARCEL' THEN coalesce(ostra.SHIPMENT_VERSION_NUMBER,0)+coalesce(ostra.PARCEL_VERSION_NUMBER,0)+coalesce(ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER,0) WHEN tratyp.name='STOCK PARCEL' THEN ostra.SHIPMENT_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='OTC SWAP' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='OTC OPTION' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='FUTURE' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='CLEARED SWAP' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='CLEARED OPTION' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='EXCHANGE OPTION' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='PARTIAL' THEN ostra.DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER WHEN tratyp.name='INVENTORY POSITION' THEN 1 WHEN tratyp.name='IN TRANSIT' THEN 1 WHEN tratyp.name='FUTURES POSITION' THEN 1 WHEN tratyp.name='COST' THEN ostra.OSTRA_PK WHEN tratyp.name=concat('P',chr(38),'L ADJUSTMENT') THEN ostra.OSTRA_PK END TRANSACTION_VERSION,
ostra.deal_version_number, ostra.shipment_version_number, ostra.parcel_version_number, CASE WHEN tratyp.NAME='NA' THEN '' ELSE tratyp.NAME END TRANSACTION_TYPE,
--business day ospsp.BUSINESS_DAY_OSBSD_FK, osbsd.BUSINESS_DAY, osbsd.PREVIOUS_BUSINESS_DAY,
--bus unit
ospsp.ist_business_unit_rdibu_fk, rdibu.business_unit_name IST_BUSINESS_UNIT_NAME, rdlge.company_name LEGAL_ENTITY_NAME, rdibu.rdibu_gi RDIBU_GI, rdlge.rdlge_gi RDLGE_GI, --region --*** REG FK REG NAME REG GI ospsp.region_rdreg_fk, rdreg.name region_name, rdreg.rdreg_gi rdreg_gi, --Chain ospsp.chain_oscha_fk, oscha.chain_prefix, concat(oscha.chain_prefix, substr(to_char(oscha.chain_number, '0000'),2)) as CHAIN, oscha.chain_number, oscha.book BOOK, oscha.bench BENCH, --Inventory ospsp.inventory_grade_rdgrd_fk, CASE WHEN rdgrd.grade_name='NA' THEN '' ELSE rdgrd.grade_name END INVENTORY_GRADE_NAME, rdgrd.rdgrd_gi INVENTORY_RDGRD_GI,
--Market ospsp.market_rdloc_fk, CASE WHEN rdloc.market_name='NA' THEN '' ELSE rdloc.market_name END MARKET_NAME, CASE WHEN rdloc.parent_market_name='NA' THEN '' ELSE rdloc.parent_market_name END parent_MARKET_NAME, rdloc.rdloc_gi MARKET_RDLOC_GI,
-- in tank ospsp.intank_facility_rdfac_fk, rdfac.name INTANK_FACILITY_NAME, rdfac.description INTANK_FACILITY_DESCRIPTION, rdfac.rdfac_gi INTANK_RDFAC_GI,
--postion date
rdfdt.base_date AS POSITION_DATE, --col gas ospsp.col_gas_cycle_rdepe_fk, rdepe.expiry_cal_name COL_GAS_CAL_NAME, rdepe.period_name COL_GAS_PERIOD_NAME, rdepe.period_code COL_GAS_PERIOD_CODE, rdepe_pk, --rev1 ospsp.inventory_type_ind, ospsp.posting_type_ind, null air_vac_indicator, -- osval.air_vac_indicator, --rev1 ospsp.quantity_bbl, ospsp.quantity_mt, ospsp.quantity_m3, (case when ostra.COUNTERPARTY_RDPTY_FK = osval.IST_BUSINESS_UNIT_RDIBU_FK then concat(valuation_id ,'-' , osval.FRONT_BACK_INDICATOR) else osval.valuation_id end) valuation_id_front_back
FROM rdownerbs1.rdcod_code tratyp, rdownerbs1.rdreg_region rdreg, osownerbs1.rdlge_legal_entity_vw rdlge, rdownerbs1.rdibu_ist_business_unit rdibu, osownerbs1.rdfdt_d_formatted_date_vw rdfdt, --rdownerbs1.rdcod_code rdcod, osownerbs1.rdepe_d_expiry_period_vw rdepe, osownerbs1.osval_d_valuation osval, osownerbs1.ostra_d_transaction ostra, osownerbs1.osbsd_d_business_day osbsd, osownerbs1.ospsp_f_physical_position ospsp LEFT OUTER JOIN osownerbs1.oscha_d_chain_vw oscha ON (ospsp.chain_oscha_fk = oscha.oscha_pk) LEFT OUTER JOIN osownerbs1.rdgrd_d_grade_vw rdgrd ON (ospsp.inventory_grade_rdgrd_fk = rdgrd.rdgrd_pk) LEFT OUTER JOIN osownerbs1.rdloc_d_market_vw rdloc ON (ospsp.market_rdloc_fk = rdloc.rdloc_pk) LEFT OUTER JOIN rdownerbs1.rdfac_facility rdfac ON (ospsp.intank_facility_rdfac_fk = rdfac.rdfac_pk) , osownerbs1.oseds_end_of_day_status oseds LEFT OUTER JOIN rdownerbs1.rdcod_code eodstat ON (oseds.END_OF_DAY_STATUS_RDCOD_FK = eodstat.RDCOD_PK) LEFT OUTER JOIN rdownerbs1.rdcod_code eodtype ON (oseds.EOD_TYPE_RDCOD_FK = eodtype.rdcod_pk) LEFT OUTER JOIN rdownerbs1.rdreg_region oseds_reg ON (oseds.wd1_region_rdreg_fk = oseds_reg.rdreg_pk) WHERE oseds.end_of_day_id = ospsp.end_of_day_id and ostra.ostra_pk = ospsp.transaction_ostra_fk and osval.osval_pk = ospsp.valuation_osval_fk and tratyp.rdcod_pk = ospsp.transaction_type_rdcod_fk and osbsd.osbsd_pk = ospsp.business_day_osbsd_fk and rdfdt.rdfdt_pk = ospsp.position_date_rdfdt_fk and rdibu.rdibu_pk = ospsp.ist_business_unit_rdibu_fk and rdlge.rdlge_pk = rdibu.legal_entity_rdlge_fk and rdreg.rdreg_pk = ospsp.region_rdreg_fk and rdepe.rdepe_pk= ospsp.col_gas_cycle_rdepe_fk and ospsp.posting_type_ind ='S' and OSEDS.END_OF_DAY_ID = $$END_OF_DAY_ID ) ODS_PP_POSITIONS

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error code for this task's execution

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $Start.ErrorMsg

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Status of the previous task that is not disabled
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_TCT_ETL_JOB_CONTROL_Insert.PrevTaskStatus

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error code for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_TCT_ETL_JOB_CONTROL_Insert.ErrorCode

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_TCT_ETL_JOB_CONTROL_Insert.ErrorMsg

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Status of the previous task that is not disabled
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_EXTRACT_INV_Inventory.PrevTaskStatus

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error code for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_EXTRACT_INV_Inventory.ErrorCode

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_EXTRACT_INV_Inventory.ErrorMsg

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Status of the previous task that is not disabled
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $CaptureStatistics.PrevTaskStatus

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error code for this task's execution

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $CaptureStatistics.ErrorMsg

Save workflow log for these runs
Allow concurrent run with unique run instance name
Allow concurrent run with same run instance name
Maximum number of concurrent runs per Hub

REPOSITORY:
: This is the root element that contains the repository details, including its name, version, and database type. : This element contains a group of related Informatica objects, such as sessions and workflows. : This element defines a session configuration object, which specifies various settings and parameters for a session, such as memory allocation, error handling, and commit options. : This element defines an Informatica session, which is a collection of transformations and mappings that perform data integration operations. The provided XML contains two sessions:
s_m_TCT_ETL_JOB_CONTROL_Insert: This session is responsible for inserting data into the OSEWF_ETL_WORKFLOW table. s_m_TCT_ETL_JOB_CONTROL_Update: This session is responsible for updating the OSEWF_ETL_WORKFLOW table.
: This element represents an instance of a transformation within a session. It defines the transformation type (e.g., Source Definition, Expression, Target Definition) and its properties. : This element defines extensions or customizations for a specific transformation instance within a session. For example, it can define database connections, file operations, or lookup configurations. : This element defines an Informatica workflow, which is a sequence of tasks (including sessions) that are executed in a specific order. The provided XML contains a workflow named wf_EXTRACT_INV_GLOBAL_GOPS, which includes tasks for capturing statistics, executing the s_m_EXTRACT_INV_Inventory session, and updating the job control table. : This element represents a task within a workflow, such as a session execution, assignment, or control flow operation (e.g., Start, End). : This element defines the conditional links between tasks in a workflow, specifying the conditions under which a task should be executed based on the status of the previous task. : This element defines variables used within the workflow, such as session-level variables for capturing statistics or status information.
The XML script appears to be a part of an Informatica ETL process that extracts physical position data from an ODS (Operational Data Store) system and creates an output file for a DWH (Data Warehouse). It includes various sessions, transformations, and a workflow that orchestrates the overall process.
